page.title: 05DEPDEN HORTICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: A colourful and interesting display was produced at the anuual show held in the Erskine Centre, Chedburgh on 20th July. Although bad growing weather reduced the number of produce entries there was an increase in the total number, from last year, bringing over 40 individual prizewinners. The craft section was well supported and the juniors did well with original and amusing exhibits. The trophies were presented by Micheal Read, Chairman of Depden Parish Council Mr. Rawles won the Challenge Cup The Walladge family the Family Cup Mrs. Maureen Carr the Floral Cup with a miniture display.
